snippet: Investigators acting on a tip arrested two students who were said to be planning to target three staff members and kill as many people as possible at a suburban Los Angeles school.
abstract: Investigators acting on tip arrest two students said to be planning to target three staff members and kill as many people as possible at suburban Los Angeles school.
lead_paragraph: Investigators acting on a tip arrested two students who were said to be planning to target three staff members and kill as many people as possible at a suburban Los Angeles school.

headline.main: California: 2 Teenagers Are Arrested After Police Say They Planned Attack
headline.print_headline: California: 2 Teenagers Are Arrested After Police Say They Planned Attack
